game.name: Odds At Oddity
game.shortDescription: Odds At Oddity is a blackjack based roguelike deck builder. Manage your power betting deck, create diverse combinations and scale your points as far as you can go!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Odds At Oddity is a blackjack based roguelike deck builder. Manage your power betting deck, create diverse combinations and scale your points as far as you can go!
